title: San Francisco Giants NDLS
meta_description: You might think after a great weekend with the Blue Angels that San Francisco would be tired.
short_description: You might think after a great weekend with the Blue Angels that San Francisco would be tired.
long_description:
You might think after a great weekend with the Blue Angels that San Francisco would be tired. But the city is still buzzing with energy as our San Francisco Giants get ready for a “go big or go home” scenario tonight as they take on the Chicago Cubs in the National League Division Series elimination game.

Tonight at 6:30pm at AT&T Park, fans will don their orange and black as they cheer on pitcher Madison Bumgarner. The Giants’ future is at stake tonight. After two losses in Chicago, our Giants are looking for a win to keep them in the running.

The Giants have given fans something to BELIEVEN with World Series victories in even years 2010, 2012, and 2014. San Francisco is ready and waiting for the Giants to bring home the 2016 trophy.

At Stanford Court we believe that every little thing we do for our guests matters. With excellent service, comfortable amenities, and attention to detail, we aim to make your visit to San Francisco memorable. We believe that the little things matter to our Giants as well. In support of our Giants we have lit up our the exterior of our building in Giants orange and we’ll have the game on in our lobby. Come cheer on the Giants with us today!

Follow @StanfordCourtSF on Instagram, Facebook and Twitter for more Giants updates!
